summary: Animated Watch Face with Page Curl and Customizable Title ! Weather, Calendar !

description: You will need to install the WatchMaker Premium V3.6 or higher in order to use this watch face.Animated Watch Face with Page Curl and Customizable TitleTap on the center of the watch to switch between screen.Tap on the title to enter your OWN TITLE .Main Screen- Date- Time- Actual Temperature, Min/Max Temp., Weather Conditions- Watch/Phone Battery levelsWeather Screen- Time- Location- Actual Temperature, Min/Max Temp., Weather Conditions- 4 Days Forecast WeatherCalendar Screen- Time- Next 3 eventsCustomizable Title Screen- Full Functionalkeyboard !-Just enter your own name or whatever you want !
descriptionHTML:
You will need to install the WatchMaker Premium V3.6 or higher in order to use this watch face.

Animated Watch Face with Page Curl and Customizable Title



Tap on the center of the watch to switch between screen.
Tap on the title to enter your OWN TITLE .

Main Screen
- Date
- Time
- Actual Temperature, Min/Max Temp., Weather Conditions
- Watch/Phone Battery levels

Weather Screen
- Time
- Location
- Actual Temperature, Min/Max Temp., Weather Conditions
- 4 Days Forecast Weather

Calendar Screen
- Time
- Next 3 events

Customizable Title Screen
- Full Functionalkeyboard !
-Just enter your own name or whatever you want !
comments: Fun, Functional, Thanks BadApps Wait Its Already 10 pm time for me to clock out and go home!
great work and design i just bought two of your watch faces.. can this one have a update to change the colors like the other one that i purchase that has over forty different color themes..peace....
Cannot locate it. Cannot locate it on Galaxy S6 edge or moto 360. Please help
I can not find the app what hapen my watch is asus zenwatch .this app stolen my money
Awesome One of my favorites. Only request is to add the ability to reverse the high and low temp. I prefer to see the high temp first. Keep up the good work.
Round Need to make this for square face watches not only round
recentChanges: New Low/High Temperature for weather forecast!
